scripts.build: npm run cjs && npm run esm && npm run min && npm run size
scripts.esm: cp index.js esm/ && echo 'export default lazyTag;'>>esm/index.js
scripts.min: echo '/*! (c) 2019, Andrea Giammarchi, (ISC) */'>min.js && uglifyjs index.js --support-ie8 -c -m >> min.js
scripts.size: cat index.js | wc -c;cat min.js | wc -c;gzip -c9 min.js | wc -c;cat min.js | brotli | wc -c
